title: Wilson's Creek National Battlefield: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Special Use Fees  Special Use Permits are necessary for the following uses of the battlefield:  Use of the Group Picnic Area Commercial Filming and Photography Weddings Freedom of Speech and First Amendment Activities  If your planned activity does not fall within these categories, or for information about permits, call (417) 732-2662, ext. 225, or contact:  Chief Ranger Wilson's Creek National Battlefield 6424 W. Farm Road 182 Republic, MO 65738 (417) 732-2662, ext. 225    Commercial Filming/Still Photography Application (long form) Commercial Filming/Still Photography Application (short form) Commercial Filming Conditions
